connectivity.searchForCozmoFailedText.translation: Vous devez vous connecter à Cozmo

connectivity.updatingFirmware.translation: Mise à jour de votre Cozmo ...

connectivity.updatingFirmwareFooter.translation: You will need to reconnect to Cozmo's WiFi after the update completes.

connectivity.updateApp.translation: Vous devez mettre à jour votre application Cozmo pour continuer.

connectivity.pullTabsTitle.translation: Pull the tabs on your Cubes.

connectivity.cozmoSleepDesc.translation: Cozmo is going to sleep and will disconnect soon...

connectivity.keepCozmoOnCharger.translation: Please leave Cozmo on his charger during setup.

connectivity.replaceCozmoOnCharger.translation: Retirez et remplace Cozmo sur son chargeur.

connectivity.connectionRejected.title.translation:
Another Device is connected to Cozmo.
Please disconnect that Device and try again.

needs.unconnected.needToConnect.descript.translation: Afin de prendre soin de Cozmo et de vérifier ses besoins, vous devez d'abord vous connecter.

connectivity.sendGameplayDataPrompt.translation: Help us make Cozmo better by sending us your gameplay data and statistics.
